summary.Title: Looking for Manager/Supervisor for Restaurant
summary.Presentation: Are you passionate about service? Do you want to be part of a motivated team with high ambitions in a privileged environment? Do you have the drive to develop and nurture successful working rel

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Are you passionate about service? Do you want to be part of a motivated team with high ambitions in a privileged environment? Do you have the drive to develop and nurture successful working relationships, both with our guests and within your workplace?
Then you are who we are looking for.

WE OFFER
An exciting working day in an international environment in our Mama Rosa restaurant . We are a young and dynamic team, who together delivers a personal, stylish and elegant service of the highest international standard. various programs to give you best possible circumstances for growth and success.

ABOUT THE JOB
As our Assistant Restaurant Manager, you will support the Restaurant Manager in managing the team of Waiters and Hostesses. You will be a role model in practicing service. You must maintain high guest loyalty throughout high guest satisfaction and ensure that all guests receive a unique and magical experience. In other words by developing and managing your team, you will ensure that our guests are elevated through each interaction.

WE EXPECT
That you have experience in management in a similar position and experience from the luxury segment. We expect that you are an educated waiter or sommelier with experience from restaurant. You must be able to professionally manage a, from time to time, very hectic day where guests are always at the centre. We expect that you are detail-oriented and able to keep the grand overview, while being sincerely passionate.
